update.description: This PR is a small but significant change to the eigenvalue solver. It moves both the eigenvalues and eigenvectors into numpy MaskedArrays, which allow the NaN eigenvalues to be skipped. They are still in the array, but normal slicing operations will not access them. See [http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.10.1/reference/maskedarray.generic.html](Masked Array docs) for more details.
update.title: Mask eigenvectors and eigenvalues to hide NaN values
update.reason: Declining with Jeff's permission.  Eigentools has essentially superseded this and we don't want any adverse performance impacts on existing code.
